section.title: How the neutron client works

note.para: The neutron client is not supported at this time. When it is available, this document will be updated.

section.para: The neutron client is an open-source Python client that you use to run commands to make API calls. Currently, the neutron client is not available, but it will be supported soon. Each client command will run cURL commands that embed API requests. Once it is available, you will be able to run the client from a desktop computer or remote system, such as a cloud server. Until then, use cURL commands to make Neutron API calls.
